title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4243.33 - Eligible uses
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4243.33 - Eligible uses

State Regulations
(a) Program
funds for capital access projects provided through flexible financing programs
may be used for: (1)
new construction, renovation or leasehold improvements; (2)
the acquisition or leasing of land, buildings, machinery and equipment; (3)
soft costs related to any of the above
uses; and
(4)
working
capital. (b) Program
funds for such capital access projects may not be used for any ineligible
costs. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
4243.33

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
